items.title: Get Started
content: Learn by doing with the [Quick Start Guide](docs/quick-start/).

items.title: Ask Community
content: Look up for answers or post your questions under [Spine-Event-Engine]({{% get-site-data "spine.socials.stackoverflow" %}}) tag on Stack Overflow.
Discuss your issues in the [mailing list]({{% get-site-data "spine.socials.google_group_discussion" %}}).
